lines.text: Elvis has not left that building.
Daddy, can we go home now? I'm kinda tired from all the singin' and shootin'.
Everytime you lick a commemorative stamp with sideburns, Elvis is there.
There's criminals in the air tonight. I can smell 'em.
The man in that house over there is none other than he himself, Mr. Elvis Presley!
He ain't no earl. He is the KING!
